CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 12, 1952, pg. 27, reads: "Helsinki Bound - Mrs. Catherine Bolden Craig, formerly of Pittsburgh, watches proudly as her track protege, Catherine Hardy, goes through her training paces at Schenley Oval. Mrs. Craig and Miss Hardy were in the city last week prior to the latter's participation in the women's Olympic trials in Harrisburg July 4. It was in Harrisburg that Miss Hardy qualified for the Olympic Games to be held in Helsinki - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Runner Catherine Hardy (Lavender) wearing Fort Valley State College t-shirt running track on Schenley Oval, Squirrel Hill
